Specimen Type(s): Stool preserved in Cary-Blair transport media
Stool preserved in Culture and Sensitivity (C&S) transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Premier HpSA Flex microwell-based enzyme immunoassay kit for qualitative detection of Helicobacter pylori antigens in unpreserved or preserved human stool specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro qualitative enzyme immunoassay for detection of Helicobacter pylori antigens in unpreserved or preserved human stool specimens, to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of H. pylori infection during and after therapy.
